row.Docu:
Date: 04/05/18
Created by: Heather Tasca
Navigation (Including job name): AD/PROCESS_FLOWS/SLATE_DECISION/UCB/ADB_CS_TO_SLATE_CE_COMPLETE_EMAIL
Description: Email that process has completed. Developer:
Script used: /prod/scripts/mailattach.pl
Calendar:
Triggered by: Triggering message:
Rerun Instructions: FIX ERROR AND RERUN
Call job: __ YES _X_ NO All jobs are call jobs unless otherwise noted.
Criticality: Process must continue, bypass this job if necessary
Fixer: ps.cc
Abend History: Include date, time, and initials of modifier
Change History:

row.process:
/PS_FILEDIR/prod/scripts/mailattach.pl \ --from \ ps.cc@cu.edu \ --to \ theresa.jordan@colorado.edu \ --cc \ ps.cc@cu.edu \ --subject \ "ADB_SLATE_MATR_PROC Process Completed " \ --message \ "ADB_SLATE_MATR_PROC Process has completed successfully."
:wait 5
cd /PS_FILEDIR/AD_FILE_PARSER/CUBLD_SLATE_APPS rm CUBLD_SLATE_MATR.txt
